newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: FORECAST-Portugal spreads vs Bunds, Spanish Bonos.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Portugal spreads vs Bunds, Spanish Bonos.

text.p: The following is the daily forecast for spreads in the Portuguese bond market based on a poll of four banks and one brokerage.
Poll covers spreads between the February 2007 Portuguese cash bond (OT) and the German and Spanish equivalents, together with the spreads between the Portuguese 10 and two-year bonds.
Min spread Avge Max vs previous close
Key factors likely to affect market:

- Low volatility seen in 10-year bonds due to the Independence Day holiday in the U.S. and yesterday's threat by the Portuguese government to resign over opposition local government spending proposals. The spread against 10-year Bunds could narrow, dealers said.
